mapper.select: select sa_no, p_name, b_count, p_size, p_color, pa_payway, sa_money, sa_date from sale inner join pay on sale.pa_no = pay.pa_no inner join orders on pay.o_no = orders.o_no inner join basket on orders.b_no = basket.b_no inner join product on basket.p_code = product.p_code order by sa_date desc
